data.name: ElementalMaster Luna - The Moon Goddess And Lost Memories
data.detailed_description:
----- System -----

Spell Learning System
You can learn magic by defeating the bosses at the back of the stage!
Switch freely between various types of magic to take advantage of the stage!

Ability System
Set your abilities by changing accessories!
Find your own combination!

Difficulty Level
We have prepared a difficulty level that is gentle to those who are new to 2D action games and those who are not good at 2D action games.
We have also prepared a high difficulty mode for those who are good at action games.

Stage Missions
Each stage has multiple missions.
Complete the missions and get the rewards!

Challenge Elements
Challenge Mode" to defeat a series of bosses by setting disadvantageous conditions to the player.
Gallery Mode" to view various illustrations
Includes the above!

----- System -----

data.short_description: Elemental Master Luna" is a 2D side-scrolling action game in which you must defeat the great spirits scattered throughout the land and regain your lost divine powers. Control the goddess Luna, who has lost her memory and powers, and learn various types of magic to conquer the stages!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8.1 , 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8.1 , 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
